section.name: Download
section.p: The plugin may be downloaded here
Alternatively, use the Eclipse update site at: http://eclipse-tools.sourceforge.net/updates/

subsection.name: Requirements
subsection.p: The plugin requires Eclipse 3.0 (the current development version). It's been tested with Eclipse 3.0 M8 and M9 on Windows NT/2000. It does NOT work on Eclipse 2.x.
